mapper.select: select b.NAME,b.PROVIDER,b.LABEL,sum(s.REQ_COUNT) REQ_COUNT,sum(s.REQ_COUNT_4XX + s.REQ_COUNT_5XX) ABNORMAL_REQ_COUNT,avg(s.AVG_LATENCY) AVG_LATENCY from TB_APP_STATISTICS s left join TB_BIGDATA b on b.APIPRODUCT_ID = s.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID where s.CATA_LOG = 7 and b.CATA_LOG = 7 and s.APP_NAME = #{name} group by b.NAME,b.PROVIDER,b.LABEL order by REQ_COUNT desc

select b.NAME,b.PROVIDER,b.LABEL,sum(s.REQ_COUNT) REQ_COUNT,sum(s.REQ_COUNT_4XX + s.REQ_COUNT_5XX) ABNORMAL_REQ_COUNT,avg(s.AVG_LATENCY) AVG_LATENCY from TB_APP_STATISTICS s left join TB_BIGDATA b on b.APIPRODUCT_ID = s.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID where s.CATA_LOG in (8,9,10) and b.CATA_LOG in (8,9,10) and s.APP_NAME = #{name} group by b.NAME,b.PROVIDER,b.LABEL order by REQ_COUNT desc
select a.SERVICE_TYPE_NAME NAME,p.SUB_TYPE from TB_APPLICATION_INFO a left join TB_PAAS p on p.id = a.SERVICE_TYPE_ID where a.STATUS = 3 and a.RESOURCE_TYPE = 3 and a.APP_NAME = #{name}
